sentences: Amber Mary Bain (born 13 July 1995), known professionally as The Japanese House, is an English indie pop musician from Buckinghamshire.
She began writing music under the moniker the Japanese House in 2012, after being introduced to Matty Healy of the 1975, who offered to help produce her music under the label Dirty Hit.
She began writing music under the moniker the Japanese House in 2012, after being introduced to Matty Healy of the 1975, who offered to help produce her music under the label Dirty Hit.
In 2015, Bain released her debut EP Pools to Bathe In and the follow-up EP Clean.
She toured with Dirty Hit labelmates the 1975 and Wolf Alice in 2015 and 2016 before headlining tours of her own.
She toured with Dirty Hit labelmates the 1975 and Wolf Alice in 2015 and 2016 before headlining tours of her own.
Her third EP, Swim Against the Tide (2016) was influenced by 80s synthpop and technopop.
Her fourth EP, Saw You in a Dream (2017) saw her continued experimentation with different genres of electronica and rock.
Bain co-produced her first full-length album Good at Falling (2019) with George Daniel and American record producer BJ Burton.
Bain co-produced her first full-length album Good at Falling (2019) with George Daniel and American record producer BJ Burton.
Her fifth EP, The LA Sessions (2019), featured live recordings of reimagined tracks from Good at Falling and Saw You in a Dream.
Her fifth EP, The LA Sessions (2019), featured live recordings of reimagined tracks from Good at Falling and Saw You in a Dream.

sentences: The property had been previously owned by Kate Winslet, with furnishings reminiscent of traditional Japanese tea houses, which inspired Bain's musical moniker.
section: == Public image and anonymity ==

sentences: After the release of her debut EP Pools to Bathe In, fans speculated about her gender and identity, with some even claiming that The Japanese House was Matty Healy of the 1975.
section: == Public image and anonymity ==

sentences: In a 2019 interview she noted that her official social media accounts even used her full name, Amber Bain.
section: == Public image and anonymity ==

sentences: She has been compared to the 1975 with whom she has toured, particularly band members Matty Healy and George Daniel who helped produce many of her tracks.
section: == Artistry == | === Influences ===

sentences: In a 2019 interview with W Magazine, she described herself as "a modern day, more depressing ABBA".

sentences: Saw You in a Dream was a yacht rock album, while Good at Falling was influenced by rock and art pop.

sentences: Her later releases have been favorably compared to her first two EPs, with critics noting the more mature lyrics and refined composition of Swim Against the Tide and Good at Falling.

sentences: Bain's debut album Good at Falling was praised by its critics for its dark, heartfelt lyrics and light, pop melodies.

sentences: Bain currently resides in East London, and has a pet German Shepherd named Calvin.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: She has been open about her struggle with alcohol abuse, and stated that she became sober after the release of Good at Falling.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: The song "Maybe You're the Reason" from Good at Falling deals with her past struggles with an eating disorder, and this subject is also depicted in the music video for "Lilo".

sentences: Bain was in a four-year relationship with singer-songwriter Marika Hackman until 2018.
